name: Fungal Facesitting
outcome: [AttackerName] lures [TargetName] closer to her, her exotic spores digging into [TargetHisOrHer] brain. Once close enough [AttackerName] grabs the adventurer and places [TargetHisOrHer] face inbetween her slender, smooth thighs. Without any further provocation [TargetName] begins to lick dutifully at the budding lips of the mushroom girl.
miss: [AttackerName] attempts to grab at [TargetName], who steps away from [AttackerName] right as she goes for the grab.
